column1: question
Can you provide an example of a time when you had to create test plans, test cases, and test scripts based on requirement documents and business user stories?
Describe a situation where you developed and maintained automated test suites using test automation tools and development languages like Python.
Have you ever executed test cases, documented test results, and raised defects when necessary? Can you walk me through that process?
How have you used JIRA, Confluence, and qTest for test case management, defect management, and test reporting in your previous roles?
Can you give an example of a time when you participated in agile ceremonies like sprint planning, grooming sessions, stand-up meetings, demo sessions, and retrospective meetings?
Have you been involved in end-to-end and integration testing before? Can you provide an example?
Describe a situation where you participated in defect triage and Scrum meetings. What was your role and contribution?
How do you ensure that your automated test suites are effective and efficient in catching defects?
Can you provide an example of a challenging defect you encountered during testing and how you resolved it?
How do you prioritize your testing tasks when working on multiple projects simultaneously?
Describe a time when you had to work under pressure to meet a tight deadline for testing. How did you handle it?
Have you ever had to communicate complex technical information to non-technical team members or stakeholders? How did you ensure they understood?
Can you give an example of a time when you had to troubleshoot and debug issues in automated test scripts? How did you approach the problem?
How do you stay updated on the latest trends and best practices in test automation and software development?
Describe a situation where you had to adapt to changes in project requirements or priorities. How did you handle it?
Have you ever had to mentor or train junior team members in test automation tools and techniques? Can you provide an example?
How do you ensure that your test cases cover all necessary scenarios and edge cases?
Can you provide an example of a time when you collaborated with developers to ensure test coverage and quality?
Describe a situation where you had to escalate a critical defect to management. How did you communicate the severity and impact of the issue?
How do you approach regression testing in your test automation process? Can you walk me through your strategy?
Have you ever had to work with cross-functional teams to coordinate testing efforts across different departments or locations? How did you ensure alignment?
Can you give an example of a time when you had to troubleshoot compatibility issues between different systems or platforms during testing?
Describe a situation where you had to make a trade-off between thorough testing and meeting project deadlines. How did you handle that decision?
How do you ensure that your test automation scripts are maintainable and scalable as the project evolves?
Can you provide an example of a time when you had to refactor existing test scripts to improve efficiency and reliability?
Describe a situation
